DOC.brief_summary: Double blind , crossover randomize , multicentric study compare efficacy tolerability concomitant administration travoprost brinzolamide versus timolol-dorzolamide fixed combination patient glaucoma ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: A Phase IV Study Travoprost + Brinzolamide Treat Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Diagnosis bilateral Primary open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension Intra Ocular Pressure 19 millimeter mercury screen visit 8:00 AM Stable visual field last 6 month 6 week wash previous topical medication Age
